data.meanings: to mark/sign/distinguish, creations/beings, world, science/learning/knowledge/information, aware/know. By means of which one knows a thing, hence it signifies world or creation, because by it the Creator is known. alim (pl. ulama) - one who is learned/wise or knows.
data.sentence: The word الْعَالَمِينَ comes from the root ع ل م and is associated with the meanings: to mark/sign/distinguish, creations/beings, world, science/learning/knowledge/information, aware/know. By means of which one knows a thing, hence it signifies world or creation, because by it the Creator is known. alim (pl. ulama) - one who is learned/wise or knows.

data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهَ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.

data.meanings: to rule/command/reign, be capable, to control, power/authority, king, kingdom.
data.sentence: The word الْمَلَائِكَةُ comes from the root م ل ك and is associated with the meanings: to rule/command/reign, be capable, to control, power/authority, king, kingdom.

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word قَالَتِ comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
The word يَامَرْيَمُ comes from the root م ر ي م and is associated with the meanings: Mariam, Mary

data.meanings: it became clear/limpid/pure (often said of a drink), opposite of Kaf-Dal-Ra, free from turbidness/thickness/muddiness, free from admixture, became cloudless (said of air/atmosphere, but also said of love/life/mind/heart), clear/pure/best/choice/favoured part/potion, clear/clarify, true/sincere, distinguish particularly/specially, select/elect/prefer, serenity of life, comfort, reciprocal sincerity/purity.. take the best of, to choose in preference to, grant to another a preference in the choice of anything.. abound with milk (said of a she-camel/ewe/goat/sheep), palm-tree heavy with fruit,. reached stone (said of a digger).. the portion of the spoil, which the chief/commander chooses for himself before the division.. become destitute/devoid.. stone, smooth stone/rock, stone that doesn't give growth to anything, hard broad stone, a certain place in Mekkeh.
data.sentence: The word اصْطَفَاكِ comes from the root ص ف و and is associated with the meanings: it became clear/limpid/pure (often said of a drink), opposite of Kaf-Dal-Ra, free from turbidness/thickness/muddiness, free from admixture, became cloudless (said of air/atmosphere, but also said of love/life/mind/heart), clear/pure/best/choice/favoured part/potion, clear/clarify, true/sincere, distinguish particularly/specially, select/elect/prefer, serenity of life, comfort, reciprocal sincerity/purity.. take the best of, to choose in preference to, grant to another a preference in the choice of anything.. abound with milk (said of a she-camel/ewe/goat/sheep), palm-tree heavy with fruit,. reached stone (said of a digger).. the portion of the spoil, which the chief/commander chooses for himself before the division.. become destitute/devoid.. stone, smooth stone/rock, stone that doesn't give growth to anything, hard broad stone, a certain place in Mekkeh.

data.meanings: to be or become clean/pure or free of dirt, made it or caused it to be distant/remote, cleanse/wash/purify, refrain, remove oneself, to clear/clean, ablution. Tay-ha/Ha-Ya = spread out, extend/expand.
data.sentence: The word وَطَهَّرَكِ comes from the root ط ه ر and is associated with the meanings: to be or become clean/pure or free of dirt, made it or caused it to be distant/remote, cleanse/wash/purify, refrain, remove oneself, to clear/clean, ablution. Tay-ha/Ha-Ya = spread out, extend/expand.

data.meanings: women. There is no singular of this word.
data.sentence: The word نِسَاءِ comes from the root ن س و and is associated with the meanings: women. There is no singular of this word.
